column4: hey everyone... I need a command (or preferably multiple) executed every time I start a terminal (to alter PS1) -- my first guess was .profile but that's for login shells... which file do I need?
thank you nosrednaekim and Jowi and eck
and francois too I guess, although that doesn't seem right
Kinda depends - you can run apps etc. on startup and configure it through gnome for example
